name: Kesar Kulfi Recipe - Indian Ice Cream with Saffron. Vegan Glutenfree
description: Kesar Kulfi Recipe - Saffron Cream Popsicles. Vegan Kulfi with saffron, coconut milk, cashews and starch to thicken. Makes 4 to 6 popsicles
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup ground raw sugar (1/2 cup for sweeter)
1/2 teaspoon saffron strands (less or more to taste)
1 can full fat Coconut milk (13.5 oz (Or use 1/2 can coconut milk, and 3/4 cup almond or other non dairy milk))
1/3 cup ground raw cashews (1/2 cup for thicker. Or use pistachio or walnut or a combination of the nuts)

recipeInstructions.text: In pan, add the water and saffron and let sit for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In pan, add the water and saffron and let sit for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sugar and mix. Keep stirring in between and bring the mixture to a bubbling boil on medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the sugar and mix. Keep stirring in between and bring the mixture to a bubbling boil on medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, In another bowl, mix the cashews, cornstarch with 1/2 cup coconut milk and keep ready.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, In another bowl, mix the cashews, cornstarch with 1/2 cup coconut milk and keep ready.

recipeInstructions.text: Add this to the boiling sugar syrup. Add cardamom and salt and bring to a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Add this to the boiling sugar syrup. Add cardamom and salt and bring to a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rest of the milk and mix well. Taste and adjust sugar and salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the rest of the milk and mix well. Taste and adjust sugar and salt.

recipeInstructions.text: Add nuts or dried fruits if using at this point and fold into the creamy mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add nuts or dried fruits if using at this point and fold into the creamy mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into kulfi molds or pop molds or ice cube tray.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour into kulfi molds or pop molds or ice cube tray.

recipeInstructions.text: Freeze, pop out, top with coarsely chopped Pistachios and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Freeze, pop out, top with coarsely chopped Pistachios and serve.

recipeInstructions.text: You can also serve the Kulfi mixture chilled as Rabdi. Or add cooked rice or quinoa and simmer for 5 minutes. Chill for a few hours and serve as Kheer!
recipeInstructions.name: You can also serve the Kulfi mixture chilled as Rabdi. Or add cooked rice or quinoa and simmer for 5 minutes. Chill for a few hours and serve as Kheer!
